pages.text: vampirism is a terrible curse that most consider terminal. $(br2)vampires are technically immortal, though their immortality feeds on the blood of humans; without it, they die. additionally, they are weak to silver and garlic.

vampirism cannot be cast with a brazier; instead, it has to be contracted from another vampire.$(br2)to contract the curse, one must be under the curse of susceptibility and be slain by a vampire... but still survive.$(br2)but why would you want this?
